anime.description: In a city of a parallel world. A boy finds a pair of broken scissors from his father`s belongings after he passed away. And a boy`s mother tells him that his father had been a gardener in the past. Then he figures out the scissors were made by Sasuke, who is an artisan living in a foreign country. The boy travels all the way to a place where Sasuke lives in order to get his scissors fixed. Source: Official page
